name: Not Quite SRL
description:
***[DISCLAIMER: I do not own the rights to the Destiny IP nor claim any ownership of Bungies Ideas]***

This game is a faithful recreation of the Sparrow Racing League or "SRL" game mode in Destiny 1.

The game features both solo and matchmaking play capabilities with AI racers to fill in the gaps where real players are not!

There is currently only one map, one of the communities all time favorites "Haakon Precipice" featuring the infamous Forklift!

If the interest in this project is high enough I have plans to add customization, more maps, controller support and maybe even more!

CONTROLS:

  1. Move: [WASD]
  2. Turn/Look: [Mouse]
  3. Air break turn: [Left Mouse Button]
  4. Side dash: [Q] and [E]

Credits:

Sparrow model made using www.destinystlgenerator.com

Destiny belongs to Bungie
